result.eng: And here comes the man himself.
result.ga: agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.orig: agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.html: agus seo chugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.
result.ponchtml: agus seo ċugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.

result.eng: He would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ga: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.orig: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.html: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ponchtml: ḃeaḋ sé ag loiceaḋ air féin dá dtréigfeaḋ sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.

result.html: chuaigh sé leis an pholaitíochtHe devoted himself to politics.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ sé leis an ṗolaitíoċtHe devoted himself to politics.

result.eng: He wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ga: theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na heorpa
result.orig: theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na heorpa
result.html: theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na heorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ponchtml: ṫeastaiġ uaiḋ dul i dtaiṫí ar ċultúr na heorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáin
result.orig: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáin
result.html: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí mohammad atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ġearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.html: tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ponchtml: ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: The master pulled towards himself the big book.
result.ga: tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mór
result.orig: tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mór
result.html: tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mórThe master pulled towards himself the big book.
result.ponchtml: ṫarraing an máistir air an leaḃar mórThe master pulled towards himself the big book.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
